member.summary: Extension methods for configuring and enhancing the application pipeline.

member.summary: Adds middleware for handling exceptions in the request pipeline.

member.summary: Extends IServiceCollection with custom service configuration methods.

member.summary: Configures routing to automatically convert incoming URLs to lowercase.

The configuration containing API versioning settings.
